title: [Discussion]If anyone (boy) joining PESU RR ... then saath me milkr PG lele
content:
at PESU RR, boys hostels are filled and packed so we have to choose a hostel...
My branch:-CSE

comments.body: What!! No seats left even for people not from Bengaluru??
Not sure but I saw a post like this on reddit so....
Ohh, is there any way to confirm?
U can call pesu customer care number
Yeah i will also try to ask a senior and let u know bro

there is hostel for boys

its outside campus tho its an extension block

we have briefing for it tmmrw

yo can go to college hostel get ur name written down
How much is the distance between college and hostel of RR campus?
